statements: SELECT * FROM supply_chain_logistics;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT manufacturer, supplier, quantity FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, supplier, location FROM supply_chain_logistics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, location FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE location LIKE '%Store%';
SELECT product_name, supplier, quantity FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE location='Warehouse A' ORDER BY quantity DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company' AND location='Factory' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, quantity FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE supplier='Supplier X' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, supplier, location FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-04-01' ORDER BY location, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_products, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM supply_chain_logistics GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_products > 2 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainLogistics WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, shipment_date FROM SupplyChainLogistics WHERE manufacturer_name = 'ABC Manufacturing';
SELECT receiver_name, manufacturing_date FROM SupplyChainLogistics WHERE manufacturing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, shipment_date FROM SupplyChainLogistics ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT block_id, data, timestamp FROM BlockchainEcosystem WHERE previous_block_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainLogistics WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, manufacturing_date FROM SupplyChainLogistics WHERE receiver_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT manufacturer_name, shipment_date, receiver_name FROM SupplyChainLogistics ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturing_date, receiver_name FROM SupplyChainLogistics WHERE manufacturing_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT receiver_name, product_id, shipment_date FROM SupplyChainLogistics WHERE receiver_name LIKE '%Corporation%';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, supplier_id FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE receiver_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM product_details ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM product_details WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, weight FROM product_details WHERE weight > 5 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, description FROM product_details WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_person FROM supplier_info WHERE location LIKE '%California%' OR location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions INNER JOIN product_details ON supply_chain_transactions.product_id = product_details.product_id;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_logistics;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc';
SELECT shipment_id, supplier, delivery_date FROM shipment_details ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, transaction_id, timestamp FROM blockchain_records WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT location, status FROM tracking_history WHERE status = 'In transit' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company' AND expiration_date > '2022-12-31';

SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date, expiration_date FROM supply_chain_logistics WHERE manufacturer IN ('XYZ Corp', '123 Industries') AND production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM shipment_details LEFT JOIN tracking_history ON shipment_details.shipment_id = tracking_history.record_id WHERE shipment_details.delivery_date < '2022-09-30';

SELECT shipment_id, product_name, supplier, receiver, shipment_date, delivery_date FROM shipment_details INNER JOIN supply_chain_logistics ON shipment_details.product_id = supply_chain_logistics.id WHERE supply_chain_logistics.quantity < 50 ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT block_id, timestamp FROM blockchain ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, location, capacity FROM warehouses WHERE cost_per_day < 50 ORDER BY warehouse_id;
SELECT shipment_id, product_id, warehouse_id, quantity, shipment_date FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
